connector.description: Forwards an event to a secured HTTP endpoint

camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.url.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.url
camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.url.description: The URL to send data to Example: https://my-service/path

camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.authMeth.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.authMethod
camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.authMeth.description: Authentication methods allowed to use as a comma separated list of values Basic, Digest or NTLM.

camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.authenti.name: camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.authenticationPreemptive
camel.kamelet.http-secured-sink.authenti.description: If this option is true, camel-http sends preemptive basic authentication to the server.
